extendedInfo.description: First Commonwealth Bank's mobile banking is designed for your "on-the-go" lifestyle. You can easily and quickly check your account balances, transfer funds between accounts, locate ATMs or branch offices and much more! Experience a whole new level of service and convenience when managing your finances from your mobile device.

reviews.title: Great Bank, Great App.
reviews.comment: You have to sign on to a PC and answer the security questions before using the app. It\'s a wonderful security feature. No, you do NOT have to stay logged in on the PC to use the app and you don\'t have to answer.the questions before every.log in.  The app us terrific
reviews.author: Brandy Cochran

reviews.title: Excellent!! Two suggestions - widget & log-in
reviews.comment: Excellent app!! Please add home screen widget similar or alike to Mints and option to remain logged in.
reviews.author: Jeff Fanala

reviews.comment: Very basic and simple app. The developers could have added some personalization settings\tThe app doesn\'t rotate to landscape position but downloading a rotation app fixes that. Also every time you close the app even just for a second it logs you out. That wouldn\'t be bad if they could have included a calculator feature in the app itself. I searched for branches near me and Google maps isn\'t working properly within the app.  The app isn\'t horrible but it is simple enough for anyone to use. For the first FC app it\'s fine enough. I\'m just so happy they finally got one out there!
reviews.author: Tasha Schloder

reviews.title: Samsung gnex
reviews.comment: Okay I\'d like to put my foot in my mouth. This app is great. The problem that people are experiencing is that you MUST go on line to register for the mobile banking on their new website. After that the app works incredibly well! Most responsive banking app I\'ve ever used. Thank you first Commonwealth!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for on-the-go
reviews.comment: Exactly what I need for on the go banking. Basic, simple functionality. I had trouble logging in but after I logged on to the PC browser app and changed my security questions, it worked fine.
reviews.author: Gregory Scrimager

reviews.title: Solid
reviews.comment: This app, along with paperless statement option were long overdue. Should not have taken until 2013 to see these features. That said, this app is solid. Basically the same as what you see on your web bank account on a real computer. A must have for FCB customers.
reviews.author: Brandon McCarron

reviews.title: Fantastic!!
reviews.comment: Once I activated the mobile app through the online banking (also a brand new look), I have all of my account info at my fingertips!! Definitely a must have app!!
reviews.author: Jennifer Knoll

reviews.title: Finally!!!!
reviews.comment: Been waiting for a mobile app for first Commonwealth.... love it
reviews.author: Shawn Lloyd

reviews.title: Does what I need it to do.
reviews.comment: Only things I\'d like to see added is a landscape layout when my phone is tilted and an option to remove the non native keyboard warning that pops up every time I open app. Other than that, excellent app. Been hoping for awhile that FC would eventually put out a banking app. Glad they didn\'t disappoint.
reviews.author: Erik Lafferty

reviews.title: Worth the wait!
reviews.comment: Works great! Love having account info and bill pay at my finger tips!  All the hard work has paid off!  Great app!
reviews.author: Katy Gibson

reviews.title: Kris
reviews.comment: The app does not rotate and there is no mobile deposit.  You would think that rotating to use a keyboard would be standard in this day and age.  And mobile is leading tech but I defer back to no rotation as an indicator of lack of market awareness.
reviews.author: Kris McNutt

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: About time this bank got mobile... Always sucked. For those having problems, u have to register your account for mobile through the actual website on your account first to use the app.
reviews.author: Zachery McKinney

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I have a s3 and everything went great. Thanks ! Pls add a calculator
reviews.author: cheryl kaminski

reviews.title: Usually awesome
reviews.comment: It was working great, now all it does is keep loading and doesn\'t eventually load anything!
reviews.author: Ashley MP

reviews.title: Chris
reviews.comment: Works great.  Very easy to use.
reviews.author: Chris Grimes

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I use this app a lot and it works well but I most know why does it ask for root rights?
reviews.author: Josh Hassa

reviews.title: Helpful!
reviews.comment: Love this app! Definitely a great addition to FCB!
reviews.author: Mike Pacacha

reviews.title: HTC thunderbolt
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work. Won\'t log in, just says unable to retrieve user info
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus s 4g
reviews.comment: This bank is terrible. First they tell mobile banking is coming then they release a non working app!? This thing keeps saying invalid even though its the same PC login I use....
reviews.author: Joshua Galup

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This is great. It runs smoothly, but before you download the app, YOU MUST ACTIVATE YOUR PHONE ONLINE. It will not let you log in unless you have added mobile banking to your account.
reviews.author: Alexandria SImon
